root@ISP1:~# cat rules

*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [705:50478]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [713:64376]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [413:43999]
-A FORWARD -d 203.0.0.1/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT
COMMIT
# Completed on Mon Feb  8 10:41:33 2021
# Generated by iptables-save v1.6.0 on Mon Feb  8 10:41:33 2021
*nat
:PREROUTING ACCEPT [270:20737]
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [6:418]
:POSTROUTING ACCEPT [12:778]
-A PREROUTING -d 192.168.53.150/32 -i ens4 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 80 -j DNAT --to-destination 203.0.0.1
-A POSTROUTING -s 203.0.0.0/24 -o ens4 -j MASQUERADE
COMMIT
# Completed on Mon Feb  8 10:41:33 2021

root@ISP2:~# cat rules
